testSteps.description: When I create new products by providing a name, type, upc, price, description and model get status code 201

children.description: Creating product with name: McVities Biscuits28861, type: Biscuits & Crackers, upc: 1234582244, price: 2.98, description: This is a placeholder request for creating a new product and model: xyz71424

}
